title: #374 – The evolutionary biology of testosterone: how it shapes male development and sex-based behavioral differences Carole Hooven, Ph.D.
summary: “If we want to interfere with the male desire to compete, we are also interfering with whatever products we get or advances we get from that intense drive.” —Carole Hooven The post #374 – The evolutionary biology of testosterone: how it shapes male development and sex-based behavioral differences | Carole Hooven, Ph.D. appeared first on Peter Attia.
author: Peter Attia
